titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2956) to require the Secretary of Defense to commence the reduction of the number of United States Armed Forces in Iraq to a limited presence by April 1, 2008, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 110-226, by Ms. Slaughter.
All points of order against the bill and against its consideration are waived except thos arising under clause 9 or 10 or rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 83.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 533.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by recorded vote: 225 - 197 (Roll no. 620).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 221 - 196 (Roll no. 621).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/12/2007--Passed House without amendment. Sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 2956 (Responsible Redeployment from Iraq Act).
